document_data.name: Nymph
document_data.mainbody: '''Nymphs''' were [[fey]] said to be nature's embodiment of physical beauty; they were also guardians of wild places.
document_data.Description: Nymphs were about the height and weight of a female [[elf]], but they were blindingly beautiful.
document_data.Personality: Some considered nymphs to be the most wild and capricious type of fey.

Society.Homelands:
Compared to [[Faer√ªn]], nymphs were a more common occurrence on the [[Evermeet]], though still relatively rare. There they inhabited forests, glades, and valleys.

In the [[Zakhara]] region's [[Crowded Sea]], nymphs could be found on the island chain of [[Nada al-Hazan]] and the archipelago of [[Jazayir al-Sartan]].
Society.Relationships:
Nymphs were sometimes sent as agents of the [[elven pantheon|elven gods]] [[Corellon Larethian]] or [[Erevan Ilesere]].{{Cite web enhancement/Deity Do's and Don'ts|10-15}}

Among the [[elves]] that inhabited Evermeet, nymphs were viewed as being spiritual representatives of the elven gods and they in turn seemed to be positively inclined towards them, rarely harming elves. Some of the island's elves, especially those of the [[green elves|green]] and [[silver elves|silver]] variety, purposely sought them out.
